amendment.description: Amendment allows rural water systems serving 10,000 people or less to be considered eligible for the grants provided in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subsection on selection of projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Conaway.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
